alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Northwestern Fremont County Above 8500Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chaffee and northwestern Fremont Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 853 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salida, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salida, Poncha Springs and Waugh Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
